attributes.action: Legislate to Encourage Parents to have Children giving financial help to families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These days many children are being saved in a Mother"s Womb for those parents that care.
Still the lies of Abortion spreads like a plague through our Society, parents are frightened to take responsibility for rearing a child in this Society.
So called "Family Planning" charities have damaged the heart and soul of the Citizens of this Country.
Recent figures show that one in four children being born are from immigrants settling into this Country.
This government must help families Now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
